feature_model.name: DrupalSplot
feature_model.feature_tree: r: DRUPAL (DRUPAL) :m NODE (NODE) :o BLOG (BLOG) :o FORUM (FORUM) :m SYSTEM (SYSTEM) :m FILTER (FILTER) :m FIELD (FIELD) :m FIELD_SQL_STORAGE (FIELD_SQL_STORAGE) :m TEXT (TEXT) :o OPTIONS (OPTIONS) :o FIELD_UI (FIELD_UI) :o IMAGE (IMAGE) :o FILE (FILE) :o CTOOLS (CTOOLS) :o CTOOLS_ACCESS_RULESET (CTOOLS_ACCESS_RULESET) :o VIEWS_CONTENT (VIEWS_CONTENT) :o CTOOLS_CUSTOM_CONTENT (CTOOLS_CUSTOM_CONTENT) :m USER (USER) :o VIEWS (VIEWS) :o VIEWS_UI (VIEWS_UI) :o TAXONOMY (TAXONOMY) :o COMMENT (COMMENT) :o PATH (PATH) :o TOKEN (TOKEN) :o PATHAUTO (PATHAUTO) :o LIBRARIES_API (LIBRARIES_API) :o DATE (DATE) :m DATE_API (DATE_API) :o DATE_POPUP (DATE_POPUP) :o DATE_VIEWS (DATE_VIEWS) :o WEBFORM (WEBFORM) :o GOOGLE_ANALYTICS (GOOGLE_ANALYTICS) :o LINK (LINK) :o CKEDITOR (CKEDITOR) :o BACKUP_AND_MIGRATE (BACKUP_AND_MIGRATE) :o JQUERY_UPDATE (JQUERY_UPDATE) :o CAPTCHA (CAPTCHA) :o IMAGE_CAPTCHA (IMAGE_CAPTCHA) :o FEATURES (FEATURES) :o PANELS (PANELS) :o PANEL_NODES (PANEL_NODES) :o PANELS_IN_PLACE_EDITOR (PANELS_IN_PLACE_EDITOR) :o ENTITY_API (ENTITY_API) :o ENTITY_TOKENS (ENTITY_TOKENS) :o IMCE (IMCE) :o RULES (RULES) :o RULES_SCHEDULER (RULES_SCHEDULER) :o RULES_UI (RULES_UI)
feature_model.constraints: CTC-1: ~FORUM or TAXONOMY CTC-2: ~FORUM or OPTIONS CTC-3: ~FORUM or COMMENT CTC-4: ~IMAGE or FILE CTC-5: ~VIEWS_CONTENT or VIEWS CTC-6: ~VIEWS or CTOOLS CTC-7: ~VIEWS_UI or CTOOLS CTC-8: ~TAXONOMY or OPTIONS CTC-9: ~PATHAUTO or TOKEN CTC-10: ~PATHAUTO or PATH CTC-11: ~DATE_POPUP or DATE_API CTC-12: ~DATE_VIEWS or DATE_API CTC-13: ~DATE_VIEWS or VIEWS CTC-14: ~DATE_VIEWS or CTOOLS CTC-15: ~PANELS or CTOOLS CTC-16: ~PANEL_NODES or CTOOLS CTC-17: ~PANELS_IN_PLACE_EDITOR or CTOOLS CTC-18: ~RULES or ENTITY_API CTC-19: ~RULES or ENTITY_TOKENS CTC-20: ~RULES_SCHEDULER or ENTITY_API CTC-21: ~RULES_SCHEDULER or ENTITY_TOKENS CTC-22: ~RULES_UI or ENTITY_API CTC-23: ~RULES_UI or ENTITY_TOKENS
